A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: *sigh*  Saw the first at a theatre in 1977\, Indianapolis\, IN.  The first six were absolutely phenomenal.  Unfortunately\, #8 (skipping #7)\, was a complete disappointment.  Rambling\, nonsensical musings with some strange humor mixed in\, left me\, and apparently many others\, wanting.  They sold Luke Skywalker short in this movie...so much potential\, so little creative prose.  What I found fascinating....as the movie ended\, you could clearly hear collective moans and a spattering of delightful applause at the same time.  That's what I love about the human being....diversity in thought.  Methinks that the third in this trilogy will be much better...I hope.
